meanings.definition: A person who destroys or damages property.
meanings.sent1: The trahsers left a trail of destruction in the park.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was tired of dealing with the trashers who vandalized buildings.
meanings.sent3: The trashers accidentally knocked over the trash cans while playing soccer.
meanings.sent4: The trashers were like a storm, leaving chaos in their wake.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the trashers, they can cause a lot of harm.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who engage in destructive behavior.
meanings.sent1: The trashers gathered in the alley to plan their next mischief.
meanings.sent2: The community worked together to stop the trashers from causing more damage.
meanings.sent3: The trashers thought it was funny to prank each other with fake spiders.
meanings.sent4: The trashers were a tornado of trouble, disrupting the peace of the town.
meanings.sent5: The trashers were like a pack of wolves, causing chaos wherever they went.

meanings.sent1: They trashers vandalized the bus stop with graffiti.
meanings.sent2: The kids accidentally trashed the living room while playing.
meanings.sent3: He trashers the sandcastle by stepping on it.
meanings.sent4: The storm trashed the garden, scattering plants everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The reckless driver trashed the mailbox with their car.
